Отделы.question: Покажи все отделы с их иерархией
Отделы.sql: SELECT id, departmentname, parentid, description FROM eq_departments WHERE deleted = false ORDER BY parentid, departmentname

Отделы.question: Количество пользователей в каждом отделе
Отделы.sql: SELECT d.departmentname, COUNT(u.id) as user_count FROM eq_departments d LEFT JOIN equsers u ON d.id = u.department AND u.deleted = false WHERE d.deleted = false GROUP BY d.id, d.departmentname

Роли.question: Все роли в системе
Роли.sql: SELECT id, rolename, description FROM eqroles WHERE deleted = false

Роли.question: Пользователи с определенной ролью
Роли.sql: SELECT u.login, u.email, r.rolename FROM equsers u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN eqroles r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE r.rolename = ? AND u.deleted = false
